name: The Dragon Keeper Is Late
description:
You're late! You have to rush through the first task of the day: feeding the dragons!

But be careful in your haste: dragons will only eat food which matches either their TYPE (vegetal, mineral, animal) or their COLOR (brown, blue, green).

To get a high score: feed as many dragons as possible, avoid mistakes, and get it moving: the dragons are hungry!

Use any key to play (this is a one-button game).

For mobile: rotate your phone in landscape then load the game page.

Credits:

Programming, art & game design: Léa P.B.

Music: "Hillbilly Swing" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com). Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Sound effects:

- Argh (angry) cartoon type mans voice by mikolajcar. https://freesound.org/people/mikolajcar/sounds/559827/ Licensed under the Attribution 4.0 License.

- Swoosh sound by lesaucisson. https://freesound.org/people/lesaucisson/sounds/585256/ Licensed under the Creative Commons 0 License.

- Happy thanks by AmeAngelofSin. https://freesound.org/people/AmeAngelofSin/sounds/234042/ Licensed under the Attribution 4.0 License.

Font: Questa Complete by The Questa Project
